name: airQuality_getValue
description: This function is used to check the air quality in the user's home via a SmartThings device.

parameters.name: location
parameters.description: The location where the air quality is being checked.

parameters.name: room
parameters.description: The room where the air quality is being checked.

parameters.name: device
parameters.description: The name or type of the device to check the air quality.
